item.title: Red One Tops Prime Video Streaming Record In Spite Of Dismal Box Office
item.description: Red One has wasted no time becoming a streaming hit as it sets a Prime Video record despite the movie's lackluster box office performance.

item.title: 10 Actors That Suddenly Became The "Hero" In All Of Their Movies
item.description: From Adam Sandler to Vin Diesel, some of Hollywoodâ€™s biggest actors rarely play the bad guy in a movie and always portray the hero of the story.

item.title: Christian Bale & Matthew McConaughey's 2002 Collaboration Is Still One Of The 21st Century's Wildest Films
item.description: Reign of Fire brings dragons and the apocalypse to the UK and features an impressive cast in one of the wildest movies of the early 2000s.
